name: Smack Em Up
description:
This software is still under active development.

Smack Em Up is an  Old School Beat Em up !   Created by MK Games 

(  Smack Em Up )

Smack  City Has Been overrun by  Ratchet and his Thugs ! its up to you to take the city back any way necessary.  Good Luck Agent !

Thank you for viewing this page  and supporting  Smack Em Up with out you this game would not be where it is today !
